title: RIOT WHYYYYYY YOU DO THIS TO MEEEE? D: D: D:
body:
Why must you bring out the best skins for the most horrible champions?? D: now i have to breach my moral standards and play Yi just like i did for teemo with his skin D: whyyyyy cant someone who isn't a menace get a cool skin so i can play them without guilt and fear of going to the darkest hell after i play them...

On a positive note, the whole project skin line are so good that i will have to get them all. and I'm very hard to impress, I'm very critical with skins, so well done.
they look like they are from Destiny, especially Yi.

replies.body: Zed and Leona are my favourites why couldn't they release this sooner I could have bought Project Zed instead of Shockblade T_T
i love the project and mecha skins. i hope they continue with the sci-fi/futuristic themes
